unnormalised: Crop insurance is vital for Indian farmers, especially those in drought-prone areas like Vidarbha. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) plays a key role, but claim disbursement delays are concerning. Dr. Patil's research shows many farmers still lack awareness. Better outreach and quicker processing of Rs. 5000 compensation/acre would improve trust. Consider insuring even small holdings like 1000 sq ft.
